Package com.datastax.astra.client

package com.datastax.astra.client
Core Data API Client Classes.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.datastax.astra.client.admin
    Admin Data API Client Classes (ddl on databases and namespaces).
    com.datastax.astra.client.exception
    Specialized exceptions thrown by the Client.
    com.datastax.astra.client.model
    Dto Used in public interfaces: types, documents `*Options``*Resuult`
  • Class
    Description
    Collection<DOC>
    A Data API collection, the main object to interact with the Data API, especially for DDL operations.
    DataAPIClient
    Entry point to access the Data API.
    DataAPIClients
    Initialization of the client in a Static way.
    DataAPIOptions
    Options to set up the client for DataApiClient.
    DataAPIOptions.DataAPIClientOptionsBuilder
    Builder for the DataAPIClientOptions.
    DataAPIOptions.DataAPIDestination
    Represent the destination of the data API.
    DataAPIOptions.HttpClientOptions
    Options to set up http Client.
    DataAPIOptions.HttpProxy
    Subclass to represent an http proxy.
    Database
    Class to interact with a Namespace.
